channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- Sametime
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- Sametime

item.title: CVE-2024-30124|2024-10-23T18:34:41.741Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: HCL Sametime is impacted by insecure services in-use on the UIM client by default. An unused legacy REST service was enabled by default using the HTTP protocol. An attacker could potentially use this service endpoint maliciously.

item.title: CVE-2024-30122|2024-10-23T14:59:04.223Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: HCL Sametime is impacted by misconfigured security related HTTP headers. It was identified that some HTTP headers were missing on web service responses. This will lead to less secure browser default treatment for the policies controlled by these headers.

item.title: CVE-2024-30124|2024-10-23T15:17:24.303Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: HCL Sametime is impacted by insecure services in-use on the UIM client by default. An unused legacy REST service was enabled by default using the HTTP protocol. An attacker could potentially use this service endpoint maliciously.

item.title: CVE-2024-30122|2024-10-23T15:54:17.632Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: HCL Sametime is impacted by misconfigured security related HTTP headers. It was identified that some HTTP headers were missing on web service responses. This will lead to less secure browser default treatment for the policies controlled by these headers.
